leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 可信与不确定性量化生态

unit.unit_name: 校准/置信度/选择性预测

tools.name: Lightweight VIO
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical uncertainty learning framework for robust visual-inertial state estimation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight visual-inertial odometry (VIO) system that incorporates statistical uncertainty learning to improve robustness and accuracy in state estimation for robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: RaPId
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for parameter identification and calibration of dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: RaPId (Rapid Parameter Identification) is a toolbox for model validation and calibration of dynamical systems, with a specific focus on power systems. It utilizes optimization and simulation technologies to align models with observed data.

tools.name: CalibrationNN
tools.one_line_profile: Library for model calibration using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform probability calibration for machine learning models using neural network-based approaches, aiming to produce more accurate confidence estimates.

tools.name: FOQUS
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Optimization and Quantification of Uncertainty and Surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework developed by the CCSI (Carbon Capture Simulation Initiative) for advanced simulation-based optimization, uncertainty quantification, and surrogate modeling of complex scientific processes.

tools.name: rosdyn
tools.one_line_profile: Automated robot dynamics model calibration package
tools.detailed_description: A ROS-based package that implements a fully automated procedure for calibrating robot dynamics models. It leverages the ROS ecosystem to standardize data exchange and robot driver access for identification of dynamic parameters.

tools.name: EnsembleKalmanProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Kalman Inversion and Uncertainty Quantification in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing Ensemble Kalman Processes for gradient-free optimization and approximate uncertainty quantification, widely used in climate modeling and inverse problems.

tools.name: allan_ros2
tools.one_line_profile: IMU noise parameter analysis using Allan deviation plots
tools.detailed_description: A ROS2 package for analyzing Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) noise characteristics by generating and analyzing Allan deviation plots, essential for sensor calibration in robotics and navigation.

tools.name: PyESD
tools.one_line_profile: Empirical Statistical Downscaling tool for climate variables
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Empirical Statistical Downscaling (ESD) of climate variables (e.g., precipitation, temperature) from reanalysis datasets to point scale, utilizing machine learning methods as transfer functions.

tools.name: net:cal
tools.one_line_profile: Calibration framework for uncertainty estimation in neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for measuring and mitigating miscalibration in predictive uncertainty estimates of neural networks. It provides various calibration methods (scaling, binning) and metrics.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A highly adaptable Python toolkit for enriching decision-making processes with uncertainty quantification. It supports multi-fidelity modeling, experimental design, Bayesian optimization, and Bayesian quadrature.

tools.name: HiRAM
tools.one_line_profile: GFDL High Resolution Atmospheric Model
tools.detailed_description: The GFDL global High Resolution Atmospheric Model (HiRAM), designed to simulate the statistics of tropical storms and weather events with high fidelity. It is a key tool for studying climate variability and global warming effects on storm activity.

tools.name: OpenSA
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for spectral analysis algorithms
tools.detailed_description: OpenSA (Open Spectrum Analysis) is a complete algorithm library for spectral analysis, covering dataset splitting, spectrum preprocessing, wavelength selection, and calibration model algorithms.

tools.name: GaussianLSS
tools.one_line_profile: Depth uncertainty estimation via Gaussian Splatting
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation of GaussianLSS, a method for depth uncertainty estimation in real-world BEV perception using Gaussian Splatting.

tools.name: UQ360
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible toolkit for uncertainty quantification in ML
tools.detailed_description: Uncertainty Quantification 360 (UQ360) is an open-source toolkit providing a comprehensive set of algorithms and metrics to estimate, communicate, and use uncertainty in machine learning model predictions.

tools.name: ESL
tools.one_line_profile: Library for economic and financial agent-based models
tools.detailed_description: The Economic Simulation Library provides tools to develop, test, analyze, and calibrate economic and financial agent-based models, supporting parallel computation and large-scale sampling.

tools.name: DifFlow3D
tools.one_line_profile: Robust uncertainty-aware scene flow estimation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DifFlow3D, a method for robust uncertainty-aware scene flow estimation using iterative diffusion-based refinement.

tools.name: crepe-vamp-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Vamp plugin for CREPE monophonic pitch tracker
tools.detailed_description: A Vamp plugin implementation of the CREPE monophonic pitch tracker, based on a deep convolutional neural network operating directly on time-domain waveform input.

tools.name: KinectUtil
tools.one_line_profile: Calibration tool for Kinect RGB and depth cameras
tools.detailed_description: A utility to solve the mismatch between RGB and depth cameras of Kinect by calibrating parameters and re-projecting images, improving point cloud quality.

tools.name: FisherRF
tools.one_line_profile: Active view selection and UQ for radiance fields
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of FisherRF, a method for active view selection and uncertainty quantification for radiance fields using Fisher Information.

tools.name: PALoc
tools.one_line_profile: SLAM benchmarking with prior-assisted trajectory generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for advancing SLAM benchmarking with prior-assisted 6-DoF trajectory generation and uncertainty estimation.

tools.name: calibration-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: NumPy library for calibration metrics
tools.detailed_description: A NumPy-based library providing various metrics for evaluating the calibration of machine learning models.

tools.name: ConformalPrediction.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction for ML models in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for predictive uncertainty quantification through Conformal Prediction, designed to work with machine learning models trained in MLJ.

tools.name: UncertaintyQuantification.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library dedicated to uncertainty quantification methods and analysis.

tools.name: nlp-uncertainty-zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Model zoo for NLP uncertainty quantification methods
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based model zoo implementing different kinds of uncertainty quantification methods specifically for Natural Language Processing tasks.

tools.name: RGGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Tolerance-aware LiDAR-camera online calibration
tools.detailed_description: Official Tensorflow implementation of RGGNet, a method for tolerance-aware LiDAR-camera online calibration using geometric deep learning.

tools.name: PyDREAM
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for model optimization and calibration in biology
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MT-DREAM(ZS) algorithm for model optimization, calibration, and selection, often used in systems biology.

tools.name: Guiding-Pseudo-labels-with-Uncertainty-Estimation
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-guided pseudo-labels for domain adaptation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for guiding pseudo-labels with uncertainty estimation for source-free unsupervised domain adaptation.

tools.name: neuralrgbd
tools.one_line_profile: Per-pixel depth and uncertainty estimation from RGB video
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Neural RGB->D Sensing, providing per-pixel depth and its uncertainty estimation from a monocular RGB video.

tools.name: UNIQUE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for benchmarking uncertainty estimation methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for benchmarking uncertainty estimation and quantification methods for Machine Learning models predictions.

tools.name: calisim
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for the calibration and evaluation of simulation models
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for the calibration and evaluation of simulation models, providing methods to adjust model parameters to match observed data.

tools.name: UQpy
tools.one_line_profile: General purpose Python toolbox for modeling uncertainty in physical and mathematical systems
tools.detailed_description: UQpy (Uncertainty Quantification with python) is a general purpose Python toolbox for modeling uncertainty in physical and mathematical systems, offering modules for sampling, reliability, and stochastic process generation.

tools.name: SciMLExpectations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for scientific machine learning and differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for fast uncertainty quantification in scientific machine learning (SciML) and differential equations, providing expectation calculations and uncertainty propagation.

tools.name: NeuralABM
tools.one_line_profile: Neural parameter calibration for multi-agent models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses neural networks to estimate marginal densities on parameters and networks for the calibration of multi-agent based models (ABMs).

tools.name: torchuq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for uncertainty quantification based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for uncertainty quantification, providing implementations of various UQ methods including calibration, conformal prediction, and Bayesian approximation.

tools.name: EasyVVUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for verification, validation and uncertainty quantification of simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to facilitate verification, validation, and uncertainty quantification (VVUQ) for a wide variety of high-performance computing simulations.

tools.name: LLM-judge-reporting
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for bias correction and confidence intervals in LLM evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A plug-in framework that corrects bias and computes confidence intervals in LLM-as-a-judge evaluations, featuring an adaptive algorithm for efficient calibration sample allocation.

tools.name: pycalibrate
tools.one_line_profile: Library to visually analyze model calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to visually analyze and diagnose the calibration of machine learning models, providing various plotting and metric calculation utilities.

tools.name: vbll
tools.one_line_profile: Simple and cheap neural network uncertainty estimation
tools.detailed_description: A library for Variational Bayesian Last Layer (VBLL) implementation, providing a simple and computationally efficient method for uncertainty estimation in neural networks.

tools.name: kyle
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calibrating classifiers and computing calibration metrics
tools.detailed_description: A library focused on the calibration of probabilistic classifiers, offering tools to compute calibration metrics and apply calibration methods.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message passing neural networks for molecular property prediction with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for molecular property prediction using Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs), featuring fast and scalable uncertainty quantification, accelerated optimization, and guided virtual screening.

tools.name: conformal-risk
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction for controlling monotonic risk functions
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based implementation for Conformal Risk Control (CRC), allowing rigorous control of monotonic risk functions in computer vision and NLP tasks.

tools.name: conformal-time-series
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction for time-series applications
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of conformal prediction methods specifically designed for time-series data, including the EnbPI (Ensemble Batch Prediction Intervals) algorithm.

tools.name: conformal_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for PyTorch classifiers to output conformal prediction sets
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper tool for PyTorch classifiers that enables them to output prediction sets with theoretical guarantees of containing the true class with high probability via conformal prediction.

tools.name: im2im-uq
tools.one_line_profile: Image-to-image regression with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch tool for image-to-image regression tasks that provides rigorous, distribution-free uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: LakeEnsemblR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for lake thermodynamics multi-model ensembles and calibration
tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates multi-model ensembles for lake thermodynamics. It includes tools for calibration, sensitivity analysis, and data visualization, enabling researchers to quantify uncertainty in lake models.

tools.name: Fortuna.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for structural and system reliability analysis
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose package for structural and system reliability analysis written in Julia. It provides methods for uncertainty quantification and reliability assessment in engineering systems.

tools.name: ml-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for measuring calibration and plotting reliability diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A library providing utilities for measuring model calibration and plotting reliability diagrams (relplot). It helps in assessing the trustworthiness of machine learning model predictions.

tools.name: Fortuna
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Uncertainty Quantification in Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for uncertainty quantification (UQ) from AWS Labs. It provides tools to estimate and calibrate uncertainty in deep learning models, supporting various UQ methods.

tools.name: MDN-Keras
tools.one_line_profile: Mixture Density Networks implementation for Keras
tools.detailed_description: A generic implementation of Mixture Density Networks (MDN) for distribution and uncertainty estimation using Keras (TensorFlow). It allows for modeling complex output distributions.

tools.name: tsai-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Tsai's camera calibration algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Tsai's camera calibration model, used for estimating the parameters of a physical camera model.

tools.name: velo2cam_gazebo
tools.one_line_profile: Gazebo simulation toolkit for Lidar-camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Gazebo models, plugins, and worlds designed to test and validate calibration algorithms for Lidar-camera setups in a simulated environment.

tools.name: forestError
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Framework for Random Forest Prediction Error Estimation
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements a unified framework for estimating the prediction error of Random Forest models, aiding in uncertainty quantification for tree-based ensembles.

tools.name: cnn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian deep CNNs for surrogate modeling and UQ
tools.detailed_description: A framework for creating surrogate models using Bayesian deep convolutional encoder-decoder networks, specifically designed for uncertainty quantification in scientific modeling.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for high-dimensional surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification using physics-constrained deep learning, enabling label-free training for PDE systems.

tools.name: rans-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification for RANS Turbulence Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for quantifying uncertainty in data-driven Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) turbulence modeling.

tools.name: PyCalib
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for classifier calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to classifier calibration, providing various methods to calibrate the probabilities of machine learning classifiers.

tools.name: OpenCossan
tools.one_line_profile: Open and free toolbox for uncertainty quantification and management
tools.detailed_description: OpenCossan is a software for uncertainty quantification and management, offering algorithms for structural reliability, sensitivity analysis, and meta-modeling.

tools.name: matilda
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for modeling water resources in glacierized catchments
tools.detailed_description: MATILDA (Model for Water Resources in Glacierized Catchments) combines a temperature-index melt model with the conceptual catchment model HBV to simulate hydrological processes in glacierized regions.

tools.name: UQLM
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification for Language Models for hallucination detection
tools.detailed_description: UQLM is a Python package designed for uncertainty quantification in Large Language Models (LLMs), specifically focusing on detecting hallucinations through UQ-based methods.

tools.name: puncc
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for predictive uncertainty quantification using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: Puncc is a library that implements conformal prediction techniques to provide predictive uncertainty quantification for machine learning models.

tools.name: probmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Library for classification metrics and post-hoc calibration
tools.detailed_description: probmetrics provides tools for evaluating probabilistic classification models, including various metrics and methods for post-hoc calibration.

tools.name: Hagelslag
tools.one_line_profile: Object-based severe weather forecast verification and tracking tool
tools.detailed_description: Hagelslag is an object-based verification and tracking tool for weather forecasting models. It supports segmentation, tracking of weather fields, and scalable verification including reliability diagrams.

tools.name: coverforest
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal predictions with random forests compatible with scikit-learn
tools.detailed_description: coverforest provides a fast, scikit-learn compatible implementation of conformal prediction methods specifically designed for random forests in classification and regression tasks.

tools.name: nonconformist
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the conformal prediction framework
tools.detailed_description: Nonconformist is a Python library for conformal prediction, allowing for the estimation of confidence intervals and prediction sets with guaranteed validity.

tools.name: Fisheye-Calib-Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Fisheye Camera Model Conversion
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to convert between different fisheye camera models, facilitating calibration and integration in computer vision pipelines.

tools.name: MapAnything
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Feed-Forward Metric 3D Reconstruction Tool
tools.detailed_description: MapAnything is a system for metric 3D reconstruction from images, capable of estimating depth and geometry in a feed-forward manner.

tools.name: Selective
tools.one_line_profile: Feature Selection Library
tools.detailed_description: Selective is a library dedicated to feature selection in machine learning pipelines, helping to identify relevant variables for modeling.

tools.name: bayesian-yolov3
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv3 object detection with uncertainty estimation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the YOLOv3 object detection architecture augmented with uncertainty estimation capabilities, allowing for probabilistic object detection.

tools.name: rsofun
tools.one_line_profile: Simulating Optimal FUNctioning framework for ecosystem processes
tools.detailed_description: rsofun implements the Simulating Optimal FUNctioning framework for site-scale simulations of ecosystem processes, including modules for P-model, SPLASH, and BiomeE.

tools.name: uncertain_ground_truth
tools.one_line_profile: Implementations of Monte Carlo conformal prediction and plausibility regions
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides Jax implementations of Monte Carlo conformal prediction and statistical annotation aggregation methods, along with a dermatology dataset.

tools.name: Uncertainty Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality implementations of standard and SOTA uncertainty methods
tools.detailed_description: Uncertainty Baselines provides high-quality, reproducible implementations of standard and state-of-the-art methods for uncertainty quantification across various tasks.

tools.name: temperature_scaling
tools.one_line_profile: Simple calibration tool for neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of temperature scaling, a simple and effective method for calibrating the probabilities of neural networks.

tools.name: crepes
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for conformal prediction and calibration
tools.detailed_description: crepes is a Python package that implements conformal prediction and related methods for calibrating machine learning models. It provides wrappers to transform point predictions into prediction intervals with guaranteed coverage, supporting various conformal prediction techniques.

tools.name: RAVEN
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic risk analysis and uncertainty quantification framework
tools.detailed_description: RAVEN (Risk Analysis Virtual Environment) is a flexible and multi-purpose framework for probabilistic risk analysis, uncertainty quantification, parameter optimization, and model reduction. It is designed to wrap around complex physical codes to perform parametric and stochastic analysis.

tools.name: conformal
tools.one_line_profile: R package for conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements conformal prediction methods, allowing for the calculation of prediction intervals with valid coverage guarantees for regression and classification problems.

tools.name: VENI-VINDy-VICI
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for generative reduced order models with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven framework for building generative reduced order models (ROMs) that embed uncertainty quantification. It combines variational autoencoders and SINDy (Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics) to model dynamics and quantify uncertainty in physical systems.

tools.name: extreme-deconvolution
tools.one_line_profile: Density estimation using Gaussian mixtures with noisy data
tools.detailed_description: A technique and software for density estimation using Gaussian mixtures in the presence of noisy, heterogeneous, and incomplete data. Widely used in astronomy and physics for inferring underlying distributions from uncertain measurements.

tools.name: Chaospy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Chaospy is a numerical toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo methods. It provides tools for creating surrogate models and analyzing the propagation of uncertainty in physical models.

tools.name: icp
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Invariant Causal Prediction (ICP)
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Invariant Causal Prediction (ICP) algorithm. ICP is a method for causal inference that exploits invariance across different environments to identify causal predictors and construct confidence intervals.

tools.name: diploSHIC
tools.one_line_profile: Feature-based deep learning tool for identifying selective sweeps in genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses feature vectors calculated from genomic data to classify genomic regions into neutral, hard sweep, or soft sweep categories, aiding in the study of evolutionary biology.

tools.name: shIC
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detecting hard and soft selective sweeps in population genomics
tools.detailed_description: The Soft/Hard Inference through Classification (shIC) tool is designed to detect and classify selective sweeps (hard vs soft) in population genomic data using supervised machine learning.

tools.name: QUESO
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for quantification of uncertainty in estimation, simulation, and optimization
tools.detailed_description: QUESO (Quantification of Uncertainty for Estimation, Simulation and Optimization) is a collection of algorithms and C++ classes designed to support uncertainty quantification in scientific modeling and simulation.

tools.name: Lightning-UQ-Box
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification toolbox for neural networks using PyTorch Lightning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for applying uncertainty quantification (UQ) methods to neural networks, built on top of PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning, facilitating the development and evaluation of UQ techniques.

tools.name: LandsatTS
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing and phenological modeling of Landsat time-series data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the retrieval, cleaning, cross-calibration, and phenological modeling of Landsat time-series data for earth science and ecological research.

tools.name: model-diagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for diagnostics and calibration assessment of machine learning models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for the diagnostics and assessment of machine learning models, with a focus on calibration, reliability diagrams, and other performance metrics.

tools.name: Mads.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia framework for model analysis, decision support, and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: MADS (Model Analysis & Decision Support) is a Julia framework that provides high-level tools for model calibration, sensitivity analysis, uncertainty quantification, and decision support in scientific modeling.

tools.name: workboots
tools.one_line_profile: R package for generating bootstrap prediction intervals in tidymodels workflows
tools.detailed_description: An R package that integrates with the tidymodels ecosystem to generate bootstrap prediction intervals, aiding in uncertainty quantification for predictive models.

tools.name: CREPE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for high-accuracy pitch estimation from raw audio
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained deep convolutional neural network model and tool for pitch estimation (fundamental frequency tracking) from raw audio signals, widely used in audio signal processing and physics of sound.

tools.name: kuenm
tools.one_line_profile: R package for calibration and construction of Maxent Ecological Niche Models
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to streamline the process of calibrating, creating, and evaluating Maxent ecological niche models, ensuring robust and reproducible ecological modeling.

tools.name: torchcrepe
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of the CREPE pitch estimation algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the CREPE pitch tracker, allowing for GPU-accelerated pitch estimation and integration into PyTorch-based deep learning workflows.

tools.name: NSGA-II_Python_for_SWAT_model
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for multi-objective calibration of SWAT hydrological models
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool implementing the NSGA-II algorithm for multi-site and multi-objective calibration of the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT) model.

tools.name: uncertainty_modeller
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning library for uncertainty estimation of black-box classification systems
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to estimate uncertainty in black-box classification models, providing tools to assess confidence and reliability of predictions.

tools.name: TorchCP
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch toolbox for conformal prediction and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for conformal prediction research and application on deep learning models, built on PyTorch to provide rigorous uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: MTUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Moment Tensor Uncertainty Quantification for seismology
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for moment tensor inversion and uncertainty quantification in seismology, enabling researchers to estimate source parameters of earthquakes and other seismic events with associated uncertainties.

tools.name: keras-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification utilities for Keras models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing utilities to perform uncertainty quantification on Keras deep learning models, including implementations for various uncertainty estimation techniques.

tools.name: SMCPy
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel sequential Monte Carlo sampler for UQ
tools.detailed_description: A Python module developed by NASA for uncertainty quantification using a parallel sequential Monte Carlo sampler, designed for probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: UQPCE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification using Polynomial Chaos Expansion
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, Python-based research code for parametric, non-deterministic computational studies using non-intrusive polynomial chaos expansion surrogate modeling.

tools.name: Prognostic Algorithm Package
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for model-based prognostics and uncertainty propagation
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for model-based prognostics of engineering systems, providing algorithms for state estimation, prediction, and uncertainty propagation.

tools.name: Kinematic-Calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic kinematic calibration for serial manipulators
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm to determine the kinematic model of any serial manipulator, including methods based on circle fitting and dual vector geometry for Denavit-Hartenberg parameter determination.

tools.name: posteriors
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for uncertainty quantification and probabilistic machine learning built on top of PyTorch, providing tools for posterior estimation.

tools.name: OpenTURNS
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic modelling and uncertainty quantification library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library (with Python bindings) for probabilistic modeling, uncertainty quantification, and reliability analysis of physical systems.

tools.name: verified_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Library for verified uncertainty calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing methods for verified uncertainty calibration, as proposed in the NeurIPS 2019 paper, focusing on producing reliable probability estimates.

tools.name: CalibrationWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Guidance system for camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to guide users through the camera calibration process by modeling geometric and corner uncertainty to ensure accurate results.

tools.name: ProbDiffEq
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic solvers for differential equations in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library providing probabilistic numerical solvers for differential equations using JAX, featuring adaptive ODE solvers with calibration and state-space model factorisations.

tools.name: crepes-weighted
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted conformal prediction extension
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the 'crepes' package enabling weighted conformal prediction and conformal predictive systems, specifically designed to handle covariate shifts.

tools.name: camera_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric camera calibration with generic models
tools.detailed_description: A library for accurate geometric camera calibration supporting generic camera models, suitable for computer vision and robotics applications.

tools.name: WaveBlocks
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization framework for optics and deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based optimization framework that allows for the calibration and joint optimization of optical systems and deep learning models.

tools.name: ros-perception/calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Sensor and robot model calibration toolchain for ROS
tools.detailed_description: A toolchain within the ROS ecosystem for calibrating sensors and URDF robot models, essential for accurate robotic perception and manipulation.

tools.name: SUO-SLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Symmetry and Uncertainty-Aware Object SLAM
tools.detailed_description: A SLAM system for 6DoF object pose estimation that explicitly handles object symmetry and incorporates uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: online_conformal
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for online conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library providing methods for online conformal prediction, enabling uncertainty quantification in streaming data settings.

tools.name: ACPI
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Conformal Prediction Intervals
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enhances split conformal prediction intervals by employing a weighting strategy to create adaptive prediction intervals.

tools.name: UQTk
tools.one_line_profile: Sandia Uncertainty Quantification Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A C++/Python toolkit developed by Sandia National Laboratories for quantifying uncertainty in numerical model predictions, offering a wide range of UQ methods.

tools.name: Distribution System Model Calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms for calibrating power grid distribution models
tools.detailed_description: A set of algorithms developed by Sandia National Laboratories for calibrating models of power grid distribution systems, ensuring simulation accuracy.

tools.name: pyapprox
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional approximation and UQ tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for high-dimensional approximation, scientific machine learning, and uncertainty quantification, providing flexible and efficient tools for computational analysis.

tools.name: pytuq
tools.one_line_profile: Python Toolkit for Uncertainty Quantification from Sandia National Laboratories
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform uncertainty quantification (UQ) tasks, likely supporting sampling, sensitivity analysis, and statistical inference for computational models, developed by Sandia National Laboratories.

tools.name: MAPIE
tools.one_line_profile: Model Agnostic Prediction Interval Estimator based on conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scikit-learn-compatible library for estimating prediction intervals and controlling risks using conformal prediction methods. It supports regression, classification, and time-series forecasting tasks.

tools.name: monaco
tools.one_line_profile: Industry-grade Monte Carlo simulation library for uncertainty and sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Monte Carlo simulations to quantify uncertainty and sensitivities in computer models. It handles sampling, statistical analysis, and visualization of simulation results.

tools.name: Uncertainpy
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis toolbox for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox tailored for uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis in computational neuroscience. It is designed to work with models in the NEURON and NEST simulators, as well as general Python models.

tools.name: LLM-Uncertainty-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for Large Language Model uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking and evaluating the uncertainty quantification capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs). It provides metrics and datasets to assess how well LLMs express confidence in their generations.

tools.name: nestedcv
tools.one_line_profile: Nested cross-validation for accurate confidence intervals of prediction error
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements nested cross-validation methods to provide more accurate confidence intervals for prediction errors in machine learning models, addressing bias in standard CV estimates.

tools.name: TISSUE
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript Imputation with Spatial Single-cell Uncertainty Estimation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for estimating well-calibrated uncertainty measures for gene expression predictions in single-cell spatial transcriptomics datasets. It enables uncertainty-aware downstream analyses.

tools.name: conformal-tights
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction wrapper for scikit-learn and Darts models
tools.detailed_description: A library that adds conformal prediction capabilities to any scikit-learn regressor or Darts forecaster, enabling the generation of coherent quantiles and prediction intervals.

tools.name: linguistic_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for aligning Language Models to express calibrated confidence
tools.detailed_description: A library/framework for aligning Large Language Models (LLMs) to produce calibrated verbal statements of confidence in their long-form generations, improving the reliability of model outputs.

tools.name: ConformalImpact
tools.one_line_profile: Causal Impact analysis with conformal prediction intervals
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that combines Causal Impact analysis with MFLES (Model Free Locally Estimated Scatterplot Smoothing) and conformal prediction to provide robust prediction intervals for causal inference.

tools.name: LTS
tools.one_line_profile: Local Temperature Scaling for Probability Calibration
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Local Temperature Scaling (LTS), a method for probability calibration of deep learning models, developed by the Biomedical Image Analysis Group at UNC.

tools.name: uncertainty-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification, calibration, and metrics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification. It provides tools for calibration, metrics calculation, and visualization of uncertainty estimates for regression and classification models.

tools.name: pestpp
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable parameter estimation and uncertainty analysis tools from USGS
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for parameter estimation, uncertainty analysis, and sensitivity analysis, designed to be independent of the model being analyzed. Widely used in environmental and groundwater modeling.

tools.name: deep_uncertainty_estimation
tools.one_line_profile: General framework for uncertainty estimation in deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework and codebase implementing methods for estimating total uncertainty (aleatoric and epistemic) in deep learning models, particularly for robotics and perception tasks.

tools.name: pearsonify
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for classification intervals using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python package designed to generate classification intervals for binary classification tasks. It utilizes Pearson residuals and conformal prediction techniques to provide calibrated uncertainty estimates.

tools.name: conformalForecast
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for multistep-ahead time series conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of methods and tools implemented in R for performing multistep-ahead time series conformal prediction, enabling probabilistic forecasting with statistical validity guarantees.

tools.name: LibQPEP
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generalized quadratic pose estimation and uncertainty
tools.detailed_description: A C++/MATLAB library dedicated to solving generalized quadratic pose estimation problems. It includes functionality for describing related uncertainties, suitable for robotics and computer vision research.

tools.name: classifier-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for classifier calibration and reliability diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit providing implementations for reliability diagrams, Platt's scaling, and isotonic regression, designed to evaluate and improve the calibration of probability predictions from classifiers.
